i have gone 208 mph for for than 10 minutes.

participant_2.background:
I would love to have lunch with a koala on my ranch.
My favorite color is orange because it reminds me of Halloween and fall.
it s one of my favorite hobbies.
My four daughters are my pride and joy.
i enjoy deep sea diving.

content.text: Heyy
Hello!  How's your day going?
Pretty good! I just finished driving my bike, it was fun. You?
That's awesome! I love to drive my bike too. I've only gone as fast as 90 mph though.
That's still really fast! My first bike was a hand-me-down from my older brother, but I've never gone that fast on it.
Oh cool! I've been into bikes since I was little. I'd love to have a ranch one day and just ride around all day.
That would be amazing! I'd love to go deep sea diving with you too. I've never done it before, but I've heard it's incredible.
Oh yeah, it's definitely something everyone should try at least once. It's so peaceful and beautiful down there.
I bet! I'm sure it's something I'll never forget.
I'm sure you won't. My daughters would love to go deep sea diving too. They're always asking me to take them.
That's really sweet! I'm sure they'd love it.
Yeah, they're definitely my pride and joy.
I can imagine! They sound like great kids.
Thanks! They are a lot of work, but they're worth it.
I'm sure they are.
Yeah, they're the best.
It sounds like you have a great family.
I do, thanks! How about you? Do you have any kids?
Not yet, but I'd love to have some someday.
Well, when you do, you'll know what a wonderful experience it is.
I'm sure I will.
Yeah, it's definitely the best thing I've ever done
